backend_llm_notes: Claude Sonnet 4.5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Clear my Thursday afternoon. Update my RSVPs and help me reschedule my meetings to another time and show me as {status}.

gutts.name: Time Block Specification Parsing
gutts.capability: Interpret 'Thursday afternoon' into specific date and time range based on context
gutts.user_goal: System knows exactly which time block to clear
gutts.evidence: Resolved 'Thursday afternoon' to specific datetime range (e.g., Thu 1PM-5PM)

gutts.name: Affected Meetings Identification
gutts.capability: Find all meetings within the target time block that need rescheduling
gutts.evidence: Query identified N meetings in Thursday afternoon time block

gutts.name: RSVP Decline Execution
gutts.capability: Decline all meetings in the blocked time with appropriate notifications
gutts.user_goal: Notify organizers user won't attend these instances
gutts.evidence: RSVP status updated to 'declined' for all affected meetings

gutts.name: Alternative Slot Finding
gutts.capability: For each declined meeting, identify alternative time slots when same attendees are available
gutts.user_goal: Find times when same attendees can meet
gutts.evidence: Alternative slots identified for each meeting based on attendee availability

gutts.name: Meeting Rescheduling Proposals
gutts.capability: Send reschedule requests with proposed new times to meeting organizers/attendees
gutts.user_goal: Meetings moved to new times with attendee agreement
gutts.evidence: Reschedule proposals sent with alternative times for each meeting

gutts.name: Calendar Status Update
gutts.capability: Set user's availability/status for the blocked time (busy/away/focus time)
gutts.user_goal: Others see user as unavailable during blocked time
gutts.evidence: User status set to {status} for Thursday afternoon time block

gutts.name: Focus Time Block Creation
gutts.capability: Create placeholder calendar event for the blocked time with appropriate title/description
gutts.user_goal: Visual representation of blocked time on calendar
gutts.evidence: Focus time block event created for Thursday afternoon

gutts.name: Action Summary & Confirmation
gutts.capability: Report what was done (declined X meetings, rescheduled Y, blocked Z hours, set status)
gutts.user_goal: Understand complete outcome of the request
gutts.evidence: Summary report: 'Declined 3 meetings, proposed reschedules, blocked 4 hours, status set to {status}'

notes: Generated by Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Matches reference decomposition of 8 GUTTs
